title: LF PLAT+ TOP MAIN R5s
body:
Hi all,

Team BiG is looking for a high plat+ Top laner. The team is already established and is ranked Gold 1. We are looking for someone who has good decision making, is friendly and can play most meta top laners/is willing to learn new champions. A requirement is that you have Teamspeak. For more information add my IGN: Brussknopp  or the man in charge: BiG Bonefork. 

Thanks :)
